title: Part a
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the integral

1 point is earned for the answer

∫ 0 24 8 sin ( π x 24 ) d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@45B8@

= 122.230 or 122.231 ft 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@38B6@
descriptions:

1 point is earned for the integral

= 122.230 or 122.231 ft 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@38B6@
